content.story: Our story began on a rainy afternoon in a small coffee shop. What started as a chance encounter over a shared love of books blossomed into a beautiful journey together. Through adventures big and small, laughter and growth, we've built a love that we want to celebrate with all of you.
content.rsvpSubtitle: Please let us know if you can make it
content.closingMessage: We can't wait to celebrate with you!
